modName: Marksman New Vegas Automatic Assault Rifles Gun Mod
summary: This is the Protoype of my Main Rifles MOD.
descriptionHtml:
The animation has updated to beta version with new Animation (same time with new gameplay uploaded).
The next Update will be fixes all the bugs and better Animation.

[color=#00ffff]At least newest skyrim update version 1.9.32.8 is needed.[/color]
[u][color=#ff7700][size=3]No Supported with Dawnguard DLC [/size][/color][/u]


[center][u][b][color=#ff0000][size=6]WARNING
[/size][/color][/b][/u]
[color=#ffff00]These Mods is edited some of animation root in CK.
[/color][color=#00ffff]There is no affect in bsa files while dawnguard.esm activated.[/color]
[color=#00ff00]The Updated MOD - Do not use Dawnguard DLC for proper animation otherwise All Crossbows type weapon[/color]
[color=#00ff00]will shoot automatic (move hkx to meshes/actors.... folder).[/color]

[color=#00ffff]Version 2.0 Gameplay (in progress)[/color]

[youtube]CiFUjd9KR04[/youtube]



[color=#00ffff]Version 3.0 Gameplay will never released ;)

[/color][youtube]nEMZ9dPhvV8[/youtube]
[/center][center][/center][center][color=#00ffff]Version 1.2 Gameplay (Released)[/color]
[youtube]fZrUqgsX-qs[/youtube][/center][center][/center][center][/center][center][/center][center][color=#00ffff]Bolt action type MOD game play (released at next Mod)

[youtube]qHaKcnB3Rf0[/youtube]
[/color]
[youtube]KI4cvu9AuG4[/youtube][/center]
[color=#00ff00][size=3]New Update on version 2.5 ( no Dawnguard.esm supported )[/size][/color]
- Added Reloading script.
- Added shoulder cam view.
- Added 9mm Uzi,Mp5, & Mp7.
- Replacing Ammo to Ammo clip.
- Added the guns to LvlItems used by Bandit,Forsworn,Civil war Soldiers, and City Guards
- Updated some of the Animation.

Known Bug:
- Still Muzzle flash is big Issues even for my latest version 3.0.
- Reloading with all ammo added inside Inventory will be set automatically 9mmClip as prime object by game, but don't worry just equip glitch.
- Some Enemy Npc need few second to shoot the gun.
- The Shoulder Cam makes inaccurate aim from crosshair, at close range get a bit more left then at far range its a bit more to the right.
- The reloading must be re-equip the weapons, if before all type of ammo is zero to more than 1,and every start the game, the cam is default.
- I predicted bugs will appeared if player were level up, since reloading script attached to Player ref, seems not tested that yet.

[color=#00ffff][size=3]How to Install[/size][/color]
Copy and paste at your Skyrim/data folder the extract here.

To set shoulder cam script, by using manual edit on your skyrim.ini files. But my advice is backup ini files before edit that files.
go to your skyrim.ini files in Documets/Mygame/skyrim then open with notepad.

at very bottom of line, type new line as follow, or just copy this below.

[color=#ffff00][Camera]
fOverShoulderCombatAddY=
fOverShoulderCombatPosZ=
fOverShoulderCombatPosX=[/color]

Do not enter the values, let it empty. My script has proper position of default combat cam.
if value was added, then it will be set permanently In-Game, and cam view never be changed what so ever.

[color=#ff0000][size=3]How to Uninstall[/size][/color]
Delete Aang Assault Rifles V2.5.esp and Aang Assault Rifles V2.5.bsa in skyrim/data folder
Delete the line that just added to skyrim.ini files or replace it with backup files.

================================================================================================================================

The vanilla changes as follow (V1.2).
1. Replace Animation hkx files in crossbow.
    Fistperson:[i]
  [color=#ffff00]  Crossbowreleasedwarven.hkx
    [i]Crossbow[/i]idledrawndwarven.hkx[/color]
    [/i]ThirdPerson:[i][i]
    [color=#ffff00]Crossbowrelease.hkx
    [i]Crossbow[/i]idledrawn.hkx[/color]
[/i][/i]2. Edit some LVLitems for bows.
3. Add ammo for sale some of vendor.
[b][color=#00ffff]
How to Install[/color][/b]
Just Put [color=#00ffff]Aang Assault Rifles.esp[/color] & [color=#ffff00]Aang Assault Rifles.bsa[/color] to your skyrim/data Folder

[color=#ffff00]Known Bugs![/color]
[u][color=#ffff00]The Muzzle Flash is still buggy, you might shoot in firstperson view first, rather the 3rd person view at the first shot.[/color][/u]
There is no reload animation, that's combined in shot release animation
The held weapon aim has coded on release arrow (auto shoot). When NPC faced to any direction, the projectile still move to Player.
Some time NPC keep firing when search the player to any direction.
No reload which make any shot release animation can be skipped, by pressing sheath or unsheathed key while shot release animation started.

[color=#ff00ff]ADVANTAGES[/color]
Rampage against all kind of enemy (you will getting hungry).
Easy to hit enemy even the moving target.
Zooming with slow motion, tracer looks nicely to hit enemy target at long distance.
ammo can be created at forges, but weapon need ebony smithing perks to create it.
Unlimited ammo capacity, you know...no reload.

[color=#ff0000]DISADVANTAGES[/color]
The damage is low, you'll need add enchant weapon damage to it.
Be care full with high LVL npc like Guards, they more damage against you.
The crafting ammo and weapons materials is plenty even you can find it where ever you take the journey.
Not good in close combat.

The Next Update is in cosidering, as the finished real-life aim animation.
Even its done, the next animation such as weapons equip, drop shell, and magazine change is abviously demanded.
author: AangMOD
